page.title: 07A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A CHILD
page.content: A Wednesday morning in my house is chaos, especially this week because we are looking after a dog called,"Bobby". He loves humans but hates other dogs. I lay in bed thinking about getting up. My room is dim where the red curtains reduce the light. Bobby comes in and stcks his wet nose in my ear,which finally gets me up.I get up ,get dressed and have my breakfast.While I eat I watch Breakfast Television. At 8.30am I leave for school.I might meet a friend on the way, if not in the playgound .School starts.Register, assembly,then ,a story-this one in fact.Playtime is only fifteen minutes long,but when you're out there it seems longer.Then before you know it it's lunchtime.In the afternoon we practise our play.
